website_summaries.verdict: With a light fragrance, this all natural deodorant offers 24-hour protection.
pros: Lightly-scented, this deodorant keeps young women fresh and sweet smelling through a long and busy day
cons: Some consumers note the product is irritating to sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Safe for all kids!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I've been using this on my daughter since she was 3 years old. My and husband and I would pick her up from daycare and her little armpits would have an odor of musk which we thought was unusual because of her age, so we made a Doctor appointment with her pediatrician and he said its normal, which was a relief. The doctor told her to get a natural deodorant without fragrance so we came across Fresh Kidz and we love it!! We put a small amount under her arms at night and in the morning and we don't have that issue of smelly armpits anymore.
customer_reviews.author: MzMac

customer_reviews.title: 5 yr old daughter with body odor
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure why my daughter had very bad smelling under arms. She bathes everyday and eats healthy. We started using Fresh Kids and she is comes home after a long day smelling fine. We don't use it everyday now. Just a couple of days a week. This product works well and my daughter feels comfortable using it. The container and roll on are great. So glad I found this product and am happy other parents wrote reviews. This helped me feel more comfortable using it on my little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scent a little strong for a young person
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8 years old and occasionally has some under arm odor. I didn't want to start her on anything with harsh chemicals like I use. My daughter is not crazy about the scent. I think it's nice and clean smelling but a bit strong especially for a young girl not used to wearing anything with scent. She also did not like using a roll on though I felt like it dried fairly quickly. I think I will try a different brand next time for her but overall think it's a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Meesha77

customer_reviews.title: Smells like “an old lady”
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is all natural, keeps the stink away. My kid says she smells “like an old lady” (I don’t disagree) when she wears it. Won’t buy again for that reason. The search for natural, good smelling deodorant for a kid continues...
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled with the price but LOVE the product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter because the stores around me all only carried one deodorant for young girls and it did not really smell great, it was very woodsy and she said it smelled like daddy's (which it kind of did.). While this is a small deodorant and almost three times what we pay for the one the stores carry, we love it! It smells great and very girly and my daughters no issues with her sensitive skin while using this. The price kills me but other than that it is amazing and because of that I will continue to buy this for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my children
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it didn't work for my children! My children (boy 7 and girl 9) shower every evening and use deodorant right after. They also apply an extra layer of deodorant in the morning during the bathroom routine. But this deodorant did not last. Both of my children had strong body odor. Still looking for a healthy deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. I don't care for the scent, but it does work! I was a bit skeptical and wondered if the overwhelming scent was just masking the odor. I tried it out for myself and I'm pleasantly surprised that it works well for even adults! No chemicals, no body odor! I've tried so many others and they just don't work, and leave you stinking by noon. Buy this product! You won't be sorry! ONLY PURCHASE THIS FROM AMAZON!! EBAY SELLS THEM IN SETS MUCH CHEAPER, BUT IT IS NOT THE SAME PRODUCT! IT DOES NOT WORK!! YOU WILL GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR :)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymously

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 and a half year old daughter is super active. And we live in an extremely hot area. A few times after she comes in from playing or camp, I’ll get a whiff of stinky kid. Despite being assured she is too young for body odor, her underarms haven’t gotten that message. It’s not all the time, just on very hot days with lots of play. This works very well and doesn’t irritate her skin (which is surprising because she has very sensitive skin). I love the smell - it’s very girly but not strong. It reminds me of cotton candy and baby powder (I got the pink one).
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth scott

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year-old daughter has body odor. I didn't want her using a deodorant with harsh chemicals or a strong smell. This works well, it smells good, and it is pink. She loves it, and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: KLJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 8yr old
customer_reviews.text: I had the blue one for my son and we really like it a lot. So I ordered the pink for my daughter. I like that it's a roll on, and it's ball is the perfect size for their small armpits. The girls smell isn't what I expected, but it smells alright.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Works great and smells great
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd grader feels so mature being able to apply her own deodorant and since it has a lovely floral scent, it also feels like she is applying perfume. She loves it! It truly does prevent odor and block perspiration for a full day (24 hours). She has not experienced any burning or skin irritation at all. No complaints. She loves that she can complete gym class and still not feel sweat in her armpits. I will continue using this gentle yet effective product. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DC Lady

customer_reviews.title: These are the only brand deodorants that I will buy ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the only brand deodorants that I will buy for my girls. They seem to work well on my 10, 9, and 7 year old. I have purchased the purple several times as well, I only wish there were some new scents.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this (3 pack) for my daughter. She likes it and seems to do the job for her. However, I ran out of my deodorant and used a new bottle and liked it myself! I do have to reapply after 8-10 hours if I’m going to be working outside all day, etc. but knowing it’s a clean deodorant without harsh chemicals, I’m fine with reapplying!
customer_reviews.author: Wards

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking it would be better for the child receiving it than a regular deoderant and while I'm sure it is, non-regular deoderant just doesn't deoderize well enough. Threw these away and purchased Dove because the recipient was more concerned about not smelling like body odor and this deoderant just didn't cut it.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: The smell is nice but as soon as she started sweating a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter because of some of the reviews and the natural component. It simple didnt work for her. The smell is nice but as soon as she started sweating a little bit, her natural odor arose mixed with the smell of the deodorant so it was really nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. This is a great product for my daughter. It has a nice scent and is easy to use. It is a roll on so be careful when applying. When you first open open it, the liquid maybe all on the I side due to shipping and heat. So, expect to wipe it down, and it will be good to go. The quality and expectations of the product are spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Lanham

customer_reviews.title: Caused rash
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Caused a terrible skin itchy rash. See photo. Not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Shines

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I strtd noticing dat my 9yr armpits wer smelling.. I honestly thght no way she's to young (my opinion).. So i bought one it was ok,, but den notice her armpit getn red N a rash.. I lookd for othr ones on Amazon N reading der reviews.. Found Fresh Kidz it said natural ect.. So i did buy it (da pink one) N i was SO happy,, it did its job.. Scent is nice lyk flowery.. Da only thing is dat it is small for being $10. But wen i saw it wrkd,, N did NOT leave ne reaction to her skin,, I ddnt care honestly.. So i ordered 2 more.. VRY PLEASED
customer_reviews.author: MissSeptember

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Previous deodorant wasn’t working for my Daughter even after daily showers. Figured we’d give this a shot. It was totally worth it, she no longer has to reapply deodorant every few hours throughout the day. It’s a little pricey but I’m happy with the product and it has a light floral scent that isn’t overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Taylor

customer_reviews.title: No more stink!
customer_reviews.text: My child started smelling under the arms at 5 years old. I tried another natural product and it never worked well. Found this, gave it a try and no more smelly child! Been using for about 6 months and no issues. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My six year old has been smelling pretty bad for a while now. I was pretty skeptical about getting a deodorant for my kid at such a young age, but once I got a a-ok from her doctor I searched for something that would be non-toxic and not as thick as the usual deodorants. This has been pretty great so far. Right after a shower she puts it on, every other day or so and it’s been pretty good. I’ve seen complaints about it drying pretty fast, but all you have to do is just put the bottle upside down, roll it a bit and then apply it. There is some fragrance, but it not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I JUST LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I love this product i use both the blue and pink roll on its great for all four of my kids,due to them having sensitive skin. I bought this product 6yrs ago at a Walgreens in Norfolk Virginia for my daughter she was 3 at time and started to smell, so once i tried it and saw it didn't give her skin any reaction i bought it for my boys also its the best the body wash also is great over all its a must buy,i highly recommended it... i wish it was still sold in stores...
customer_reviews.author: Shonette A Albert

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the smell and because I was in a desperate search to find something natural that actually works for my daughter. I must say.... I am VERY impressed at how well it worked for her. So far i can say (after trying several popular brands) this is the best experience I've had with a natural deodorant. It worked for her ALL day! If you are looking a something that smells GREAT and actually gives odor protection... Give it a try. I've been pleasantly surprised by my results.
customer_reviews.author: Michele & Michael Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: love this for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: happy to have found this product. i tried other natural brands like Toms and Native, but without success. This product helped my daughter smell fresh again, even after a long day at school and after volleyball practice. Happy that this works!
customer_reviews.author: rt

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but doesn't smell great for long
customer_reviews.text: My young grand-daughter's mom was looking for a safe anti-perspirant and we found this on-line. Our grand is 10 years old, very active in sports and wants a good deodorant because she is conscious of how she smells. This deodorant fails to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: CWStew

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase !
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with my purchase. My 7 years old daughter started to have really bad body odor so I was looking for some kind of deodorant without the harmful chemicals and I decided to get this deodorant for my daughter after reading all the 5 star reviews. So far it's working, no more B.O
customer_reviews.author: drsr

customer_reviews.title: Works for adults too.
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant has excellent ingredients that are better and more safe. Even adults can use it too. It keeps odor under control as long as it's applied daily. The scent is light and pretty good, but I would prefer it in unscented though.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Face

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work! I purchased this for my six year old daughter and 15 minutes after application she was smelling like grilled onions. I am very disappointed and I will make sure to inform my friends and family to not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Endenezjia Graham

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Since it's not eligible for return I threw it away. I smells like cheap perfume. Really bad. It's a really strong smell too. You can smell it from across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Kags

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product before from a different vendor and it did not smell like the one I just received. The odor is not desirable. I was disappointed. I have to go back and purchase this from the previous vendor I did before. My little one still smells sweaty after utilizing this deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it had to use on my 6 yeald old cause she was having a bad stench it tryed everything on the book and it didn't go away . So I got this . The scent is soft . And my daughter come home with no stench
customer_reviews.author: Chichi

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful enough, scent very strong and not for girls
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking about the "natural" deodorant, but... it is not powerful enough. The scent very strong, it smells like my grandpa... I mean like a perfume for an old classic gentleman... It is not for a girl...
customer_reviews.author: sarampion2000

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr granddaughter started developing this odor under her armpit, was very concerning this could become embarrassing for her during school, my sister mention this product, I can’t rave about this product enough.. we put it on her every 3 days and she smell so could. I love the smell of this deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nice fragrance but itchy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the fragrance. But every time she applies this stick, she complains of itchiness. I had to stop using this product. Not sure why it itches.
customer_reviews.author: dolly

customer_reviews.title: Irritate skin, don't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 12 years old daughter, but unfortunately didn't work for her. She put it at night after shower and in the morning her pajamas smell bad. I started to use to myself to see if this product works to me at least. I found it very liquid, it doesn't absorb from my skin and that irritated my skin. Also didn't last for the whole day even though I am a person who doesn't sweat easily. The only thing I like about this product, was the smell. I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitrios

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work too well. My daughters arm pit still smells after a day doing PE.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: “It smells like a grandma”
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Pink scent for my 9 year old daughter. She immediately proclaimed, “It smells like a grandma.” And she was right. It doesn’t smell great at all.
customer_reviews.author: Emily in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Empty package
customer_reviews.text: I got a empty package so I can’t give you a review 🤬
customer_reviews.author: guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Made smell worse
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a month and it made my daughters arm pits smell worse! I get its "natural" but its totally did not help the smell. I regret buy two.
customer_reviews.author: MNB

customer_reviews.title: Works Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter and it works great! It smells nice and I love that it’s all natural. She has sensitive skin and has had no issues while using it. The only thing that I didn’t like was the price, but it works so I will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Great Stocking Stuffers
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren are 4 3, & 2... They loved it!!! Couldn't wait to put it on... Before the night was up they were applying it. Smells good and good for kids to learn at a young age. Great gift and to use all year round.
customer_reviews.author: PERKINS3

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this product and with everyday use I can be with ease of mind that she is not putting harsh chemicals on her body like regular deodorants. Glad I decided to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: The smell is HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: This is the strongest worst smelling deodorant I’ve ever come across. It’s nauseating. I’d expect it from an adult deodorant, NOT a children’s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STINKS !!
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if my bottle was old or what was wrong but it smelled horrible. I bought it for a 9 year old girl but she hated it. I tried to use it but almost gagged putting it on my underarms. Threw it out after 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Tn lady

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Safe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my younger granddaughters that were not teens but needed deodorant. This was reported as safe for children. Both girls like the roll on ball and the fragrance of the deodorant. It has worked well for them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Works great for young ones
customer_reviews.text: For my 7y/o it works great and has the most sensitive skin so I am so happy no breakouts or other issues after using for a week!!! Love it- great smell!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Smell was too strong
customer_reviews.text: The smell is too strong and does not even smell good. I bought it as a first deodorant for my daughter and I was very disappointed when we got it. I was deceived by the packaging and because it said that it was for kids. We ended up throwing it out and getting a different one. I wished I knew it had a strong smell before i got it. Waste of my money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fragrant
customer_reviews.text: The wetness seems to bother my daughter, and it really has quite the fragrance. Unfortunate, as I don't want my toddler to smell like a bouquet all day long - as though she's wearing perfume! It doesn't leave white residue at least...I can't quite tell if it's just masking the odor with the fragrance, or actually helping reduce it.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmine

customer_reviews.title: smell not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this deodorant for my 10 year old daughter and unfortunately the smell was not at all pleasant. I thought maybe after she wore it the smell would mold with her PH thus producing a better smell, sadly it did not. I immediately had to stop making her use it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: Kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: I just love this product. Our little one is 4 and is very active and already has body odor such as sweaty. We wanted something safe and organic. The only thing she does not like is the pasty feeling so after I apply it I must rubb it for her.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: STINKS!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stinks!!!! This is not a scent for girls, smells like a mix of patchouli and old lady musk... I ordered a three pack and it is all going in the garbage. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Smells great going on my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Smells great going on my daughter loves it. Drys with no smell witch is nice because my daughter doesn't want people to know that she wearing it. This doesn't leave marks on clothes either. Great for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Alec &Ashly Clark

customer_reviews.title: may cause rash
customer_reviews.text: our 10 year old daughter started using the product for about one month and started developing a rash under both her underarms. We have discontinued using and will look at other options. Unfortunately, we are past the return window for the 3 pack we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my seven year old.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this deodorant because I've been looking for something simple for my daughter. I do not like the smell so much because it reminds me of an old lady's perfume =( but i just apply a little... she loves the smell though!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Its a hit with my 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: So far this is doing what we wanted it to do and that is to keep her fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent deodorant for my daughter. She is young and I wanted something that was as natural as possible without compromising what it needed to do. It keeps away odors, doesn’t sweat off, and keeps my daughter dry. No aluminum!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Suburban Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good product but delivered leaky
customer_reviews.text: The deodorant was delivered already damaged , leaking to the point of not being usable and it can’t be returned .
customer_reviews.author: MBG

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product and packaged was sticky and hot, see pictures. When I opened it at least half the product was out. Not very happy. Tried to submit a replacement and product is not eligible.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not the best smell
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the purple one of these, and wanted to try pink. Neither her nor I like the scent of the pink one, and we are stuck with 3 of them. Really wish the purple was available
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Natural product that’s safe to use
customer_reviews.text: Using for my six year old daughters’ stinky pits. She loves the scent and easy roll-on!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sharpe

customer_reviews.text: Good scent but I received in very bad condition and leaking
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Smells awesome and does the job for my 9 year old. Little pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.author: roxxy

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great deodorant.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter's that are just starting to need deodorant. I didn't want them to be exposed to the chemicals in the normal deodorants. Overall we like it. The smell is a bit strong and not my favorite but my daughter likes it.
customer_reviews.author: TechGalt

customer_reviews.title: Not like UK version
customer_reviews.text: Purchased same product in the UK, same packaging and company, however this product ordered from Amazon resulted in very bad rash not only on my daughter but my wife as well. Threw it all away
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely smell, works well with sensitive skin. My daughter's skin is very sensitive, but she has no problem using this antiperspirant.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good use for 6 year old helps and feel good about the product ingredients
customer_reviews.author: charles smith

customer_reviews.title: This product stinks (literally!)
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance is way too strong for a child. It smells like cheap perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not So Fresh Kid!
customer_reviews.text: My 10-year old daughter still came home with underarm odor! This has a nice smell but it comes out very quick and drips. Either the roller ball was faulty or that was just the way it is. Great that it is aluminum free but, did not solve the problem. My daughter complained about putting it on because it was to wet and sticky.
customer_reviews.author: NSchoeneberg

customer_reviews.title: Do not use for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a rash under her arm after only one use. Just be careful for girls with sensitive skin. Unfortunately, it could not be returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this deodorant. Especially the pink.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! It lasts for hours & hours & the smell of the pink variety is fantastic. Try it. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: beachie-keen

customer_reviews.title: Does not prevent nor cover body odor!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly does not work for body odor. The deodorant itself smells of body odor after a few uses and was a waste of money. My poor 9 year old was constantly using it and it didn’t cover anything more prevent anything. No refunds offered either so skip on this product along with the boys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: Lasts all day for a sweaty kid! My daughter gets pretty stinky by the end of the day after running around. She's been using it for only a few days, but she doesn't stink by the end of the day! We used Tom's Maine deodorant before this one and she still smelled at the end of the day with that brand.
customer_reviews.author: shaun edwards

customer_reviews.title: This is not for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7 year old and thought it would be a nice soft natural smell but she could not stand the smell. I believe the funk since it said natural but how can something so strong smelling be natural and for kids?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: take note
customer_reviews.text: seem to offer protection but it caused my daughter to develop an underarm rash
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Very light and floral!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product. Its a liquid roll on and the wax kind so does not damage your clothes. My 8 year old uses it sometimes and it smeela very floral and very light.
customer_reviews.author: Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So happy I got this for my 7 year old daughter. She does sports everyday for hours and she wasn’t smelling so great after a few hours. This deodorant has helped a lot :) very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Ougm

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and works
customer_reviews.text: Great scent and worked for my 7 yo who started developing an underarm smell.
customer_reviews.author: luciane juliani

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with this purchase. I was hesitant about buying 3 sticks of deodorant for $25 but it has paid off well. It smells great and works at least long enough to get your kid through the day. No rash like what we experienced with Tom’s either.
customer_reviews.author: Emeri's

customer_reviews.title: Only product that works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter, but now I am the one using it. I've tried endless different products, from prescription-strength brand names, to all of the usual suspects in the "all natural" category. This is the ONLY ONE THAT WORKS!! I never imagined that a product developed for younger, more delicate skin, would end up working so well. And believe me I put it to the test. So happy I discovered this and will be buying more for myself and my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Has a terrible new scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 yr old daughter several months ago. Really liked it, helped reduce BO throughout the day. Went to re-order it recently and they have changed to a new scent. Honestly, it now smells like an old lady's perfume. Couldn't return it for some reason so just wanted to warn everyone, it no longer has a youthful scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney M.

customer_reviews.title: Way better than competitor!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My daughter had early BO and the toms brand didn’t put a dent in her scent. The Fresh Kids completely took away her BO. She loves the roll on and it’s a strong but pleasant scent. Wish they were sold in a variety pack on amazon. This is our second order and we still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really well for my daughter and smells so nice I’ve been tempted to steal hers!
customer_reviews.author: B. Mast

customer_reviews.title: Needs a new scent.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and once I opened it the smell was something that a grandma would wear. The smell also gave her a very bad headache so she had to go get a shower to get the scent off .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This deodorant  can be good but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my 8 years old daughter because my daughter has a bad smell. I don't like the smell of this deodorant I wish this deodorant had a gentler smell than it has and it doesn't hold a smell for my daughter for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Oksana Shvedyuk

customer_reviews.title: I will order a different smell but great product
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the smell at all. If my daughters pits are a little rank it seems like the smell combination just sits on top of the musty pit smell. But I love the consistency and it does not break her out so that is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: very good!
customer_reviews.text: A very fine product for pre teens or even teenagers. I wanted buy something for my daughter with no antiperspirant ingredient. Also wanted a decent fragrance. This one is just perfect. With one application is morning she is good for the day. I highly recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: MI

customer_reviews.title: Scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent is great very light and perfect since it's her first ever deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: Bought this deodorant for my 8 year old - the scent was ok, and I would’ve dealt with it if it worked - but it didn’t. In fact it made her armpits odor even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: nice scent and works well too
customer_reviews.text: Gentle for my pre teen daughter. It doesn't irritate her underarms and the smell is very floral and pleasant. She likes the pink scent better than the purple. I prefer a natural deoderant rather than any aluminum based product for my child.
customer_reviews.author: The Nurse Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not a favorite
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yo daughter disliked this so much I threw it away. She said it felt weird.
customer_reviews.author: countrygirl55

customer_reviews.title: While she liked the rollerball style
customer_reviews.text: While my young daughter started needing deoderant recently, I saw this and thought we would give it a try. While she liked the rollerball style, in the end we stopped using it as the smell wasn't as pleasant as we liked and switched to something with a "fruity" smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kolinl79

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good natural deodorant that actually smells good. A little costly, more than I spend on my own deodorant but it works well for my athletic daughter:)
customer_reviews.author: Robin Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Just right for a young girl
customer_reviews.text: My young daughter was sensitive about her body odor. Now no worries
customer_reviews.author: barbara franklin

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8. She loves keep it kind and we do too. She smells amazing. Her skin isn't irritated by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great Deodorant
customer_reviews.text: The girls love this deodorant. They stay smelling fresh all day after applying in the evening time after a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes the scent and ease of application. It just wears off way to quick.
customer_reviews.author: M Win

customer_reviews.title: Natural deodorant for "Girls"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself as I am allergic to so many things. Does a great job for odor control. Smells a bit perfume like but it gets better after awhile. That does not bother me as long as it works. I recommend this if you have no allergies to scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is 'kid friendly' and not full of nasty chemicals, but it's smell is quite strong. Not a bad scent per se, but one that I think is way too much for a little girl who just doesn't want to smell after dance rehearsal.
customer_reviews.author: Blogger Nis

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Its not a good product for kids with eczema. My daughter broke out under her arm so now i just used it for myself
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Huie

customer_reviews.title: It works.....
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter sweats when she go outside to play. There was a odor under her underarm that was not pleasant. This product has stopped that odor...Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blessed!!

product_meta.title: Keep it Kind Fresh Kidz Natural Roll On Deodorant 24 Hour Protection for Kids & Teens - Girls"Pink" 1.86 fl.oz. (3 Pack)
feature_bullets: ROLL-ON DEODORANT FOR GIRLS THAT DOES WORK: This deodorant range is specially designed for pre-teen and teenage girls. Not only do our Fresh Kidz deodorants provide 24 hour protection by effectively combating body odor, but we do this with safety and health as our top priority. Hip, trendy and cool line of deodorants that does not mark or stain clothing and doesn’t block pores.

DESIGNED FOR YOUNG AND SENSETIVE SKIN: For a lot of kids, chemicals, when applied to their skin, can give them heavy rashes, hives and lumps. Conventional chemical deodorants, and antiperspirants in particular, can create an intense adverse reaction. Fresh Kidz can help you avoid these uncomfortable side effects and prevent dry, chaffed, and itchy skin. Dermatologically tested and suitable for all skin types.

PROTECTS AGAINST BODY ODOR: As parents we don’t want our children to have to deal with stigma and teasing that can occur if they have body odor. Fresh Kidz is available for boys and girls in fragrances that are natural, fresh and clean smelling.

ALL NATURAL WITH NO HARMFUL CHEMICALS: A range of chemical-free personal hygiene products for kids and young teens that parents can trust! Fresh Kidz products are free of harmful chemicals, while still providing effective, all-day, odor protection. Fights bacteria, the main cause of body odor. Deodorant is free of Aluminum, Parabens, Alcohol and Harsh Sulfates. Cruelty-free and vegan.
PROTECT YOUR WARRANTY: Fresh Kidz products come with a manufacturer’s limited warranty when purchased through an authorized retailer.
